name: The Darkwater Park
description:
This is my first game created using basic JavaScript and HTML/CSS. Not graphical game. There are audio tracks where webpage generally don't have.

More about how to play this game is given in my GitHub page.

https://github.com/kvteja-512/The-Darkwater-Park

You can play this game ONLINE, no need to download! The game is officially uploaded in AWS EC2 remote server, just to bypass the download process.

The game will be saved in-case you leave the game in between.

Would like to have your feedback

Happy retro gaming!!
